sentences.english: Virtus Bologna has made numerous contract offers to the Los Angeles Lakers star.
sentences.chinese: 博洛尼亞爲湖人隊的很多球星提供了少量的合同。

sentences.english: "Stefano would like to go to Bologna - he really likes that option, " agent Domenico Scopelliti told Laromasiamonoi. it.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬中場奧卡卡的經紀人透露他將前往博洛尼亞。

sentences.english: Many students now anathematise "Bologna" as a capitalist plot.
sentences.chinese: 如今許多學生咒罵“博洛尼亞”是資本家的陰謀。

sentences.english: Come to Bologna to discover the world of Foglie d'Oro.
sentences.chinese: 一起來博洛尼亞探索菲列德羅的世界。

sentences.english: This innovative spirit is coincidently highlighted and encouraged by CERSAIE.
sentences.chinese: 這種創新精神是博洛尼亞展最鼓勵和看重的因素。

sentences.english: Bologna Central Station is a major junction within the Italian railway system.
sentences.chinese: 博洛尼亞中央車站是意大利鐵路系統主要的匯合點。
